text: E'ina hu'negu Israeli mopafima me'nea agonaramimota, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hianki antahiho, Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Israeli mopafima me'nea ranra agonaramine, neone agonaramine tinkrahotamine, aguporamine, havizama huno me'nea kumatamine, vahe'ma omani rankumataminkura tamagri tava'ontema mani'naza vahe'mo'za kiza zokago kea huneramante'za, tamefi kea huneramante'za, tamagenkea hu'naze.
